Gen: The First Book Of Moses, Called Genesis
Exo: The Second Book Of Moses, Called Exodus
Lev: The Third Book Of Moses, Called Leviticus
Num: The Fourth Book Of Moses, Called Numbers
Deu: The Fifth Book Of Moses, Called Deuteronomy
1Sa: The First Book Of Samuel Otherwise Called The First Book Of The Kings
2Sa: The Second Book Of Samuel Otherwise Called The Second Book Of The Kings
1Ki: The First Book Of The Kings, Commonly Called The Third Book Of The Kings
2Ki: The Second Book Of The Kings, Commonly Called The Fourth Book Of The Kings
1Ch: The First Book Of The Chronicles
2Ch: The Second Book Of The Chronicles
Isa: The Book Of The Prophet Isaiah
Jer: The Book Of The Prophet Jeremiah
Ezk: The Book Of The Prophet Ezekiel
Mat: The Gospel According To St. Matthew
Mrk: The Gospel According To St. Mark
Luk: The Gospel According To St. Luke
Jhn: The Gospel According To St. John
Rom: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Romans
1Co: The First Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Corinthians
2Co: The Second Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Corinthians
Gal: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Galatians
Eph: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Ephesians
Php: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Philippians
Col: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Colossians
1Th: The First Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Thessalonians
2Th: The Second Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Thessalonians
1Ti: The First Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To Timothy
2Ti: The Second Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To Timothy
Tit: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To Titus
Phm: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To Philemon
Heb: The Epistle Of Paul The Apostle To The Hebrews
1Pe: The First Epistle General Of Peter
2Pe: The Second Epistle General Of Peter
1Jn: The First Epistle General Of John
Rev: The Revelation Of St. John The Divine
